The purpose study explore diagnostic criterion subclinical hypothyroidism initial dosage L-thyroxine long-term follow infant hyperthyrotropinemia，and evaluate curative effect.All live-born neonate province take part screen program October , 1999 September ,2006 . Laboratory test perform time resolve fluoro-immunoassay ( TRFIA ) . TSH measure cut-off > 9 mU/L . The diagnostic standard subclinical hypothyroidism : TSH ≥ 20 mU/L , T3 T4 normal low-normal , TSH > 5.6 mU/L < 20 mU/L initial determination follow-up TSH level increase follow-up and/or gradually decline T4 levels.L-Thyroxine administer substitution therapy . After 2 year therapy，allround evaluation perform . Compare correlation effect different level TSH、starting time therapy environment . Compare effect subclinical、temporary permanent hypothyroidism .
